originalText.text:
I‚Äôve been coming here since 2021, when I got there Dr. Sanchez gave me the price and explained the process clearly, told me what braces to get and what to do. she recommended me the metals one because I needed to remove 4 molars not wisdom tooths from there the process been smooth (trust the process). The first thing I noticed was that from 8:40 AM and on the waiting time was 30 minutes to an hour so I changed my appointments as early as 7:00 AM and not many people are around at that time. The payment process is easy you have many options. The staff are attentive and helpful they are there for any help you want, I had read others review but I guess people‚Äôs perspective are different but mine has been a smooth experienced.
Tips to make your life easier to when you get your braces.
‚Ä¢	1 Distal End Cut Plier ‚ÄúEmergency when traveling‚Äù
‚Ä¢	As many as you can Platypus Orthodontic Flossers ‚Äúmorning and night‚Äù
‚Ä¢	1 Teeth Cleaning Tools ‚ÄúEmergency when traveling‚Äù
‚Ä¢	1 Orthodontic Dental Wire Cutter ‚ÄúEmergency when traveling‚Äù
Apart from that you are in good hands with them üòä

originalText.text: It‚Äôs a good place to get your braces and the people are really kind and nice but like the opening hours should be easier for those who have school like at 8am and can‚Äôt be late.

originalText.text: Dr. Sanchez is amazing! The reviews referring to the staff are clearly upset for personal issues and not getting their way! Love Mary and all the girls in the front, they are super nice and super accommodating!

text.text: Dr. Sanchez is amazing! The reviews referring to the staff are clearly upset for personal issues and not getting their way! Love Mary and all the girls in the front, they are super nice and super accommodating!

originalText.text: I will recommend Dr. Sanchez ti anyone. I read a lot reviews but after one year of visiting her practice I noticed that most patients are late and arrive with attitude to their appointments. Dr. Sanchez took care of my sister (sister's teeth came out perfect) teeth in 2012 and now I am her patient since 2021. In the first appointment for consultation, Dr. Sanchez gave me the price and explained the process clearly. I had visited other orthodontist in Manhattan and their prices where around 8,000 for metal braces. So, Dr. Zayda will take care of your teeth but it is a process that requires time and patience. Their staff is very friendly and bilingual especially Jane. Jane was assigned to me since 2021 and I never had a issue with her especially after I arrived late to a few appointments. There was a time when I broke one of the brakes and she took care of me without having an appointment.   The office is always busy that's why I like to schedule my appointments first time in the morning. I believe that even if you are paying for treatment that doesn't allow you to be nasty. I like their practice and their staff.
